1e:T4f2,{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"FAQPage","mainEntity":[{"@type":"Question","name":"Do Australians need a visa for Argentina?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Tourist entry: 90 days visa-free.
